description: Winter is a time of year best spent indoors, indulging in comforting foods and warming alcoholic beverages. This Winter Spiced&nbsp;Old Fashioned recipe will appeal to those who enjoy classic cocktails&nbsp;infused with festive spices. In addition to being delicious, this cocktail also has loads of citrus aroma!
